courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.shortDescription: Learn guitar from scratch with chords, strumming, and basic music theory.
courses.description: This beginner-friendly guitar course covers essential chords, strumming techniques, rhythm practice, and basic music theory. Ideal for students with no prior musical background.

instructor.name: Ali Raza
instructor.bio: Professional guitarist and music educator with international teaching experience.

courses.title: Piano Essentials for Beginners
courses.shortDescription: Master piano basics including scales, chords, and simple melodies.
courses.description: This course introduces piano fundamentals, hand positioning, scales, chords, and beginner-level songs. Designed for students of all ages.

instructor.name: Sara Khan
instructor.bio: Certified pianist with extensive experience in classical and modern music.

courses.title: Vocal Training & Voice Control
courses.shortDescription: Improve pitch, tone, breathing, and vocal strength.
courses.description: This vocal training course focuses on breathing techniques, pitch control, tone improvement, and vocal health. Suitable for beginners and intermediate singers.

instructor.name: Usman Ali
instructor.bio: Vocal coach specializing in classical and contemporary singing styles.

courses.title: Advanced Music Production
courses.shortDescription: Professional music production using modern DAWs.
courses.description: Learn advanced music production techniques including mixing, mastering, sound design, and track arrangement using industry-standard DAWs.

instructor.name: Ahmed Noor
instructor.bio: Music producer who has worked with top national and international artists.

courses.title: Classical Music Theory
courses.shortDescription: Understand the foundations of classical music theory.
courses.description: This course covers scales, harmony, rhythm, notation, and composition basics, providing a strong theoretical foundation for musicians.

instructor.name: Hina Farooq
instructor.bio: Music theorist and composer with academic and practical experience.
